Locations.Name: Village of Elderbrook
Locations.Description: A peaceful village with cobblestone streets and thatched-roof houses. The village well sits in the center of the square.

Locations.Name: Dark Forest
Locations.Description: A dense forest with towering trees that block out most sunlight. Strange sounds echo from the depths.

Locations.Name: Grassy Plains
Locations.Description: Wide open grasslands stretch as far as the eye can see. A gentle breeze rustles the tall grass.

Locations.Name: Ancient Cave
Locations.Description: A mysterious cave with glowing crystals embedded in the walls. Ancient runes are carved into the stone.

Locations.Name: Ancient Ruins
Locations.Description: Crumbling stone structures hint at a once-great civilization. Vines have overtaken most of the buildings.

Locations.Name: Dragon's Lair
Locations.Description: A massive cavern filled with treasure and the overwhelming presence of an ancient dragon. The air shimmers with magical energy.
